subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Keeping tabs on top prospects in the Frozen Four will be easy this year for the St. Louis Blues. The N.C.A.A. Division I hockey championships will be played at their arena.
snippet: Keeping tabs on top prospects in the Frozen Four will be easy this year for the St. Louis Blues. The N.C.A.A. Division I hockey championships will be played at their arena.
